reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coolest toy ever
reviews.reviewText: LOVE LOVE LOVE. This puzzle building block square toy. My 2 yo loves it and so does everyone one else in the family. It’s so easy and fun to build on it. Wil definitely be getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for light table
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for a light table and they are perfect. Colors are great and kids love the way the light shines through them. I would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toy is well made, colorful and a lot of fun to play with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better in person
reviews.reviewText: The Littles I bought these for love them- they even bought more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these blocks! I got the kids each a set of pyramid blocks in different colors.. so they can play solo with them, or play together and combine their sets for 90 blocks.. then when they are done, they each get their colors and put them in their bag.These blocks are the most unique of the 3 sets. They are translucent and made of a hard, hole plastic, the others are a firm silicone that has a soft texture.These are compatible with the other sets, just made slightly different. They are just as easy to clean. Nothing wrong with them, I just prefer the silicone blocks, personality. My kids don't notice a difference and have fun with them!These seem a little less durable, but it's hard to remark on that yet.Nonetheless, these would make the best gift for a kid of any age!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for adults and kids.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my neighbor. She has a 9 year old daughter with autism. We all loved playing with it. My 2 year old has a set of these already and we love them so I bought them a set. We spent an hour building different things from the booklet. At that point I had wished I bought 2 sets so we had more pieces. But this set came with more pieces than the one my son and I have, so that’s a bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, fun, interesting fun...intriguing fun
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually leave reviews on AmaZOOM but these are definitely what I was looking for. Blocks that weren't just square and rectangle blocks. I don't know how to describe them. The photos are exactly what they look like. The box is accurate and appropriate for 18 months +. Good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for young children
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my toddler nephew and he loved it. He likes to stack and build and organize things so this was up his alley for play. It wasn’t his first time with magnetiles so there was no learning curve, but I can see needing to teach kids how to play with them.
